## A little about me
Hello! My name is Ana Topasna. I am a third year PhD candidate in the Human Genetics and Genomics Program.

My thesis work is on understanding the genetic causes for non-CF bronchiechtasis and evaluating theraputics.

## Hobbies
In my free time I enjoy reading, rock climbing and snowboarding.
